channel.title: Ux on bradorego.com
channel.description: Recent content in Ux on bradorego.com

item.title: Better MCBW
item.description: TL;DNR Ionic lets you build apps ridiculously fast. Write once, build many. If you don't like how something's done, instead of just complaining about it, do something to make it better. Reverse engineering is easier than ever. Your success is not a factor of your codebase, but about the value you offer an end-user. The end result: Better MCBW Backstory Madison Craft Beer Week has been one of my favorite events since moving to Madison.

item.title: Nextt
item.description: About Nextt is a social event planning tool designed to help get all of your friends on the same page and to get together offline in the real world. While working with Nextt, I was responsible for development of the mobile web app (which eventually became Nextt’s Android app), as well as overseeing parts of the overall User Experience and wrangling all of the data, metrics, and analytics to help guide product development.
